|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

|availability = reference design |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/01/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01F934QZC |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B017FEZF80 |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin3 = B01N8RIE9T |asin_country3 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Based on [[Broadcom]]'s naming scheme, this device is assumed to be using BCM43602.
*BCM43602 14e4:43ba supported in 3.17+ ([http://wireless.kernel.org/en/users/Drivers/brcm80211 brcmfmac]) *BCM43602 14e4:43bb 2.4GHz device, supported in 3.19+ *BCM43602 14e4:43bc 5GHz device, supported in 3.19+
Bluetooth 4.1/LE, OUI: 00:10:18 (DELL ?) :Dimension: 46mm (L) x 15.5mm (W) x 3mm (H)
===Compatible Model=== *Apple MacBook Pro 15" A1398 (Retina 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016) *Apple MacBook Pro 13" A1425 (Retina 2012, 2013) *Apple MacBook Pro 13" A1502 (Retina 2014, 2015, 2016) :- MacBook Pro 12,1 (Early 2015): MF839LL/A (@2.7GHz Core i5) :- MacBook Pro 12,1 (Early 2015): MF841LL/A (@2.9GHz Core i5) :- MacBook Pro 12,1 (Early 2015): MF843LL/A (@3.1GHz Core i7) :- MacBook Pro 12,1 (Early 2015): (MJVE2LL/A, MJVG2LL/A)
==Links of Interest== ===Models=== *[[Apple MacBook Pro 13" (Late 2013, A1502)]] [https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/MacBook+Pro+13-Inch+Retina+Display+Late+2013+Teardown/18695 Teardown on '''iFixit'''] :[[Broadcom BCM94360CS]] *[[Apple MacBook Pro 13" (Late 2012, A1425)]] [https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/MacBook+Pro+13-Inch+Retina+Display+Late+2012+Teardown/11225#s40195 Teardown on '''iFixit'''] :[[Broadcom BCM94331CSAX]] *[[Apple MacBook Pro 15" (Mid 2012, MD103)]] [https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/MacBook+Pro+15-Inch+Retina+Display+Mid+2012+Teardown/9462#s36199 Teardown on '''Ifixit'''] :[[Broadcom BCM94331CSAX]] *[[Apple MacBook Air 13" (Mid 2013, A1466)]] [http://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/MacBook+Air+13-Inch+Mid+2013+Teardown/15042/1 Teardown on '''iFixit'''] :[[Broadcom BCM94360CS2]] *[[Apple MacBook Air 11" (Mid 2013, A1465)]] [http://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/MacBook+Air+11-Inch+Mid+2013+Teardown/15078/ Teardown on '''iFixit'''] :[[Broadcom BCM94360CS2]]
===Forum threads=== *[https://applelife.ru/threads/wi-fi-bluetooth-airdrop-handoff-i-instant-hotspot-v-os-x-10-10.42443/page-12#post-493447 On '''AppleLife''' forums] *[[User:Skvo|''Skvo'']] [http://www.tonymacx86.com/general-hardware-discussion/99327-could-next-wlan-bluetooth-combo-card-2013-macbooks.html notes the pinout of the proprietary connector used on the '''tonymacx86 forums'''] *[http://www.insanelymac.com/forum/user/332888-skvo/ On '''InsanelyMac'''] :[[Apple MacBook Pro 13" (Early 2015, Retina)]] [https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/MacBook+Pro+13-Inch+Retina+Display+Early+2015+Teardown/38300 Teardown on '''Ifixit'''] :Module: [[Broadcom BCM943602CS]] :*Wi-Fi chipset: [[Broadcom]] BCM43602 Vendor ID 0x14e4, DeviceID: 0x43ba ::[http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s817141 '''Broadcom''' News Release for BCM43602] :*Bluetooth chipset: Broadcom BCM20703 (chipset support BT 4.1).ï»¿ ::Vendor ID: 0x05ac (Apple Inc.), Product ID: 0x8290
